00055 typedef struct NearestPhotons
00056 {
00057         long unsigned m_max;
00058         long unsigned m_found;
00059         long unsigned m_gotHeap;
00060         Point3D m_pos;
00061         double* m_dist2;
00062         Photon** m_index;
00063 }NearestPhotons;
00064 
00065 class PhotonMap
00066 {
00067 public:
00068                 PhotonMap( long unsigned maxPhotons );
00069                 ~PhotonMap();

00072                 void loadPhotonMap(char *filename);
00073

00075                 double fluxAtPoint( const Point3D& point, int maxClosest ) const;
00076                 void store( Photon* photon );
00077                 void balance();
00078                 long unsigned StoredPhotons() const { return m_storedPhotons; };
00079                 Photon* GetPhoton( int index ) const;
00080 
00081 private:
00082                 void balanceSegment( Photon*** pbal, Photon*** porg, const long unsigned index, const long unsigned start, const long unsigned end );

00084

00086
